ast.name: ASP Application Service (Draft)
ast.description: As part of the application service submissions offers API's to access the submissions list or view a specific one. Messaging follows the v3 API spec defined in [here](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/15pucEI0MHj9y778EyaAWGh4MBH-I73i1-GS0ir7FhxE/edit#slide=id.g29c3ffcc3_053).

resources.name: Submissions
resources.description:
A Submission group has the following attributes:

+ work - the object describing the work that the submissions belong to

+ phase - the object describing the phase that the submissions belong to

+ numberOfRanks - total number of ranks that the submission group has

+ confirmed - whether the submissions have been confirmed or not, default to be null

+ submissions - list of submission objects within the submission group

parameters.name: work_id
parameters.description: ID of the work in form of an integer

parameters.name: phase
parameters.description: phase of the work submisssions, either "concept" or "final"; if not provided, return all the phases up to date

actions.name: Get all the submissions
actions.description: Get all the submissions for the given work and phase.

actions.name: Update submissions
actions.description: Update the confirmation of the submissions.

resources.name: A Submission
resources.description:
A Submission object has the following attributes:

+ submitter - the object describing the submitter

+ rank - rank of the submission

+ createdAt - the time when the submission is created

+ files - list of file objects associated with the submission

parameters.name: work_id
parameters.description: ID of the work in form of an integer

parameters.name: submission_id
parameters.description: ID of the submission in form of an integer

actions.name: Get a submission
actions.description: Get information about a submission based on the given submission id.

actions.name: Update a submission
actions.description: Update the rank of the submission.

resources.name: Final Fixes
resources.description:
A final-fixes object has the following attributes:

+ work - the object describing the work that the final-fixes belong to

+ phase - the object describing the phase that the final-fixes belong to

+ downloadUrl

+ confirmed - whether the submissions have been confirmed or not, default to be null

+ submitter - the object describing the submitter

+ files - list of file objects associated with the submission

parameters.name: work_id
parameters.description: ID of the work in form of an integer

actions.name: Get submission final fixes
actions.description: Get information about submission final fixes for the work.

actions.name: Update the final fixes
actions.description: Update the confirmation of final fixes of the submissions.

parameters.name: work_id
parameters.description: ID of the work in form of an integer

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: ID of the file to be accepted

resources.name: Timeline Events
resources.description: Authroization header has to be provided along with this request to identify the user.

parameters.name: work_id
parameters.description: ID of the work in form of an integer

actions.name: Get the timeline events
actions.description: Get information of the timeline events
